unnormalised: ## Bollywood Buzz: Is Ranbir Kapoor Ditching Diet Biryani for a Secret Affair…with his Treadmill?!
normalised: Okay, okay, before you call your local gossip aunties and set the phone lines ablaze, let's clarify. Rumors are flying faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw after ten P M, and this time, it involves the eternally charming Ranbir Kapoor. Sources (a k a, my chai-wala near Film City) claim Ranbir’s been spending an awful lot of time at his gym.

unnormalised: Okay, okay, before you call your local gossip aunties and set the phone lines ablaze, let's clarify. Rumors are flying faster than a Delhi auto-rickshaw after 10 PM, and this time, it involves the eternally charming Ranbir Kapoor. Sources (aka, my chai-wala near Film City) claim Ranbir’s been spending an awful lot of time at his gym.
normalised: Now, you might be thinking, "Good for him! Staying healthy is important!" But this isn’t your average 'new year, new me' resolution. This is, according to my sources, an obsessive, bordering-on-romantic, relationship with his treadmill. Apparently, he's been seen whispering sweet nothings to the incline settings. Is this his way of preparing for his next action movie? Or is he avoiding his diet of healthy biryani?

This is, according to my sources, an obsessive, bordering-on-romantic, relationship with his treadmill. Apparently, he's been seen whispering sweet nothings to the incline settings. normalised: And that’s not all, folks! Malaika Arora was recently spotted arguing with Arjun Kapoor outside a Bandra cafe. Witnesses (a gaggle of college students armed with smartphones) allege that the fight was about…wait for it…the correct way to pronounce "quinoa." Seriously? Couldn’t they have argued about something more interesting, like who ate the last piece of gulab jamun at their Diwali party?

normalised: Speaking of parties, word on the street is that Isha Ambani’s Onam sadhya was the event to be at. Apparently, even Shah Rukh Khan was seen going back for seconds (or was it thirds?) of the delicious Payasam. We can only imagine the gold-plated spoons were working overtime.

normalised: Meanwhile, in other news that’s marginally less exciting, Katrina Kaif was spotted wearing a very fetching kurta pajama at the Gateway of India. Sources say she was…wait for it…waiting for the ferry. Groundbreaking.

normalised: So there you have it, folks! Another week, another whirlwind of Bollywood gossip. Stay tuned for more scandalous (and probably completely made-up) updates. And remember, take everything with a pinch of salt…and maybe a generous helping of biryani. Because let's face it, life’s too short to worry about Ranbir's treadmill obsession.
